title.native: 劇場版デート・ア・ライブ 万由里ジャッジメント
title.romaji: Date A Live Movie: Mayuri Judgement

description:
Set in the premise after the events of Date a Live II, a mysterious existence named Mayuri has started to appear in Tengu City. Shidou set on a date to figure and find out the identity of the spirit. In order to find out the reason of the interruption of the disturbance that occurred, he goes on a date with six of the spirits that wanted him all for themselves for the mysterious being to appear.

Note: An original story supervised by the original light novel author Koushi Tachibana.
synonyms: Date A Live Movie: Mayuri Judgment
พิชิตรัก พิทักษ์โลก : เดอะมูฟวี่ คำพิพากษาของมายูริ

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

title.native: デート・ア・ライブ II 狂三スターフェスティバル

name.native: ブリドカット・セーラ・恵美
ミルドレッド・F・藤村

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/imozuka) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E9%87%8E%E8%81%A1)

Satoshi Ishino is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, character/mechanical designer and animation director.

He started working at Studio Giants, but later went to work at Studio Fantasia before becoming a freelance animator. Today he is a part of the animator group Studio Hercules (スタジオへらくれす), and he's also a part of the doujin circle TEAM Imozuka (TEAM いもずか).

Satoshi is best known for his work as a character designer and animation supervisor in the show Excel Saga and the related Puni Puni Poemi.
**Hiroyasu Oyama** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
**Houjou Makoto (北條真)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

sweet ARMS is voice actress unit composed by [Iori Nomizu](https://anilist.co/staff/103956/Iori-Nomizu), [Misuzu Togashi](https://anilist.co/staff/103806/Misuzu-Togashi), [Kaori Sadohara](https://anilist.co/staff/107284/Kaori-Sadohara), and [Misato](https://anilist.co/staff/107759/Misato).
Took part as a key animator on Quentin Tarantino's "Kill Bill: Vol. 1" in 2003.
